text: Gary Douglas Kurtz (July 27, 1940 â€“ September 23, 2018) was an American movie producer. He is known for helping produce the movies American Graffiti (1973), Star Wars (1977), The Empire Strikes Back (1980), The Dark Crystal (1982) and Return to Oz (1985). Kurtz was born in Los Angeles, California. He was twice divorced. He had three children. He later married Clare Gabriel in 2003. Kurt died of cancer in North London, England, at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie producers Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles
title: Gary Kurtz
